title: Old life, new life
creator_credit: Raelanah Loloa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: For Raelanah Loloa, moving from the town where she grew up in New Zealand to start a new life in Australia was an experience both exciting and stressful. It was hard leaving all her friends and trying to make new ones but, eventually, Raelanah and her family were able to build a new life in Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Raelanah Loloa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
